entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Terrible performance from repeated non-incremental calls to static web assets targets #49097
  • HttpRequest.Form throws an undocumented System.InvalidOperationException #49096
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter, updates #49095
  • WASM Cors fails despite allowing everything #49094
  • ClientAssets release for dotnet 7 #49092
    8.0-preview7
  • Perf regression: json #49090
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #49089

Closed

  • Optional Blazor Webassembly Components #45627
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Install the BlazorWasmDebugging VS Code extension with the C# extension #46485
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Components] Enable a root component to be the entry point for component based apps #7528
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Give the BlazorWasmDebugging extension a proper name #46486
    .NET 8 Planning
  • `dotnet new --update-apply` thinks 1.0.0-beta9 is newer than 1.0.0-beta10 and above #49077
  • Give error if a component is rendermode boundary and has parameter of type RenderFragment or RenderFragment<T> #48968
    8.0-preview7
  • [.NET 6] Backport the GenerateMvcTestManifestTask fix #48189
    6.0.x
  • Route parameters with non-string values fails #48866
    8.0-preview7
  • Hosted services start later with minimal API #39037
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Quarantine HubConnectionTest.sendsCloseMessageOnStop() #49043

PullRequests

Created

  • Add WithOrder to IEndpointConventionBuilder #49093
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix invalid catch block in StringUtilities #49082
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Fixes a typo in the components template #48962
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview7
  • Callsite rendermodes (#48967) #49055
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Remove IRoutingStateProvider from Router #49083
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Use correct casing for WebAssembly in template text #49085
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Ignore pings on sendsCloseMessageOnStop #49067
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    area-infrastructure
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure
  • Bug hash routing same page with params or query #48994
    area-blazor
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Update milestones for August servicing #48782
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
  • Change the way we detect Node.js in SignalR JS/TS client. #49066
    area-signalr
